1.7.2.name: wordpress/socialmarketing
1.7.2.description:
If managing Social Media at your company means you spend most of your time managing different social media accounts, then think again. Social Marketing allows you to push your WordPress posts to your Facebook, Twitter and Tumblr accounts without ever leaving WordPress.

  • Decide where you want to publish your information,
  • Create marketing content once within WordPress
  • Social Marketing distributes it to your social marketing platforms – automatically.

From set up through to daily usage, you work entirely within WordPress. No logging into our Web site; no need to log into different sites either. Get the benefits of Social Marketing without losing time to be social.
